name: ChessBase Database File
summary: Learn about .CBV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When you create a ChessBase database, the program saves a .CBH file with several other supporting files by default. However, you can combine all these files into a single archive in a CBV file. This is useful when copying and sharing chess databases.

description: File created by ChessBase, a program used for reviewing played chess games, often historical matches between players such as Garry Kasparov, Anatoly Karpov, and Bobby Fischer; stores chess moves played and can save many different games in the same file.
